author: Matt Simon
title: If Robots Steal So Many Jobs, Why Aren't They Saving Us Now?
description: We've been led to believe that robots and AI are replacing humans en masse. But this economic catastrophe is blowing up that myth.
content: Modern capitalism has never seen anything quite like the novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2. In a matter of months, the deadly contagious bug has spread around the world, hobbling any economy in its path. In the United States, where consumer spending accounts for m… [+6328 chars]
